strings: Yangus obtains the flail of fury and puts it in the bag.

<voice_0x010015BD><se_low>Yangus: Oi Red, wot ya doin' wiv yer feet up, eh?
We've gotta give that Rhapthorne geezer a
good 'idin', remember?

<voice_0x010015BE><se_high>Red: Yangus, Yangus, Yangus.
You just don't get it, do ya?
<voice_0x010015BF><se_high>Red: When the goin' gets tough, it's extra important to take a bit o' time to relax an' get yer strength back. No point goin' inta battle cream<->crackered, is there?

<voice_0x010015C2><se_high>Red: You can be a bit slow sometimes, can't ya?
I just 'ope that don't mean yer gonna let the side down when it comes to the crunch in battle.

<voice_0x010015C5><se_high>Red: But it's just a loan, right?
I want it back once everyfin's sorted.
<voice_0x010015C6><se_high>Red: And don't you DARE try doin' a runner wiv it, or I swear I'll find ya and I'll do ya. Got it?
<voice_0x010015C7><se_low>Yangus: Awright, keep yer 'air on. Once we've sorted this Rhapthorne geezer out, you'll get it straight back, scout's 'onour!

<voice_0x010015C8><se_high>Red: How's that flail o' fury workin' out for ya,
then, eh?

<voice_0x010015C9><se_high>Red: Remember, I only lent it to ya.
Once this is all over, I want it back.
